    public class Service_Location
extends android.app.Service
    Find current location and broadcast if location has changed

      • decideLocUPD

        public void decideLocUPD(android.location.Location locPrevSes,
                android.location.Location locG,
                android.location.Location locN,
                android.location.Location locP,
                java.lang.String FromWhat)
        Broadcast current address and trigger to update data due to significant location change.
        Parameters:
        distanceDiff - threshold of distance. If distance differs at least this value then data should be updated.
        locN - The new location fix
